backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, hydration/running/sleep logs, reminders, rewards, and analytics with access control and multiple storage maps.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend components, hooks, styles, and configuration files.
frontend/.env.example: Environment variable example file showing optional Internet Identity URL setting.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide outlining common deployment issues and solutions for the app.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind CSS variables and global styling for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry page registering the service worker and loading the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, categories, and display settings.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with simple UI and retry button.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing static asset caching, network-first fetch logic, and offline fallback handling.
frontend/PWA.md: Documentation explaining PWA installation, offline behavior, service worker checks, and troubleshooting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, profile setup, navigation tabs, and layout with various feature views and providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAnaly: Displays admin analytics metrics using cards for user activity and feature usage.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Admin dashboard that verifies admin status and shows system analytics and user activity tables with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUserA: Sortable, searchable table presenting detailed per-user analytics including activity counts and metadata.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter a name and create their profile with validation and save handling.
frontend/src/components/history/EmptySta: Simple empty-state card shown when no hydration history exists.
frontend/src/components/history/HistoryV: Displays a 7‑day intake history with stats, offline indicators, and per‑day progress cards. Fetches history data, sorts it, computes averages, and highlights days meeting goals.
frontend/src/components/intake/QuickAddI: Allows quick or custom water intake additions with online/offline handling, reward detection, and success toasts. Uses user settings and updates streaks, badges, and notifications.
frontend/src/components/intake/TodayProg: Shows today’s hydration progress, streak badge, offline notice, and goal celebration. Computes remaining intake and displays a progress bar with dynamic styling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the app header with branding, user greeting, login button, and install‑app option. Fetches user profile to personalize the greeting.
frontend/src/components/offline/OfflineS: Displays a warning banner when data is stale due to offline mode, optionally showing last update time. Formats timestamps into relative time text.
frontend/src/components/pwa/InstallAppBu: Shows an install button for the PWA when eligible and triggers the browser install prompt. Confirms installation via toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/pwa/OfflineBanne: Shows a fixed top banner warning the user when offline. Hides automatically when back online.
frontend/src/components/reminders/InAppR: Displays an in‑app reminder popup with icons, title, body, and a dismiss button. Supports multiple reminder types with themed icons.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Remind: Manages reminder settings, including enabling/disabling global reminders, CRUD for custom reminders, and streak‑break settings. Provides dialogs, validation, and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Streak: Initializes streak‑break reminder logic by invoking its hook. Renders no UI.
frontend/src/components/rewards/BadgesGr: Renders a grid of reward badges with locked/unlocked states and styling based on badge type.
frontend/src/components/rewards/GoalCele: Displays a celebratory card with animated icons when a user hits a hydration goal.
frontend/src/components/rewards/RewardsP: Shows user streaks, completed goals, and earned badges with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/running/RunHisto: Fetches and displays running history with stats, offline notices, and formatted pace/time calculations.
frontend/src/components/running/RunLogFo: Form for logging runs with validation, offline support, and submission via mutation.
frontend/src/components/running/RunningV: Combines the run log form and running history list into a single view.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: Loads and updates user settings with validation, offline queueing support, and form UI.
frontend/src/components/sleep/SleepHisto: Displays sleep history with averages, daily logs, offline notices, and loading/empty states using data from sleep queries.
frontend/src/components/sleep/SleepLogFo: Form for entering hours slept that validates input, submits logs via mutation, and handles offline queuing and toasts.
Combines the sleep log form and sleep history list into a single view.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and persistent identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks whether the browser is online using window online/offline events.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstallPrompt.t: Captures the PWA install prompt event, exposes install state, and provides a method to trigger installation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of data queries and mutations using the backend actor, supporting offline caching and action queuing.
Schedules periodic hydration reminders using notifications or in-app prompts and manages permission and running state.
frontend/src/hooks/useReminderSchedulerC: Provides a context for managing reminder notifications, handling permissions, intervals, and showing in-app or system notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useStreakBreakReminde: Checks user streak and hydration progress and fires a streak‑break reminder near end of day, with localStorage settings and anti‑spam logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers, custom color variables, dark mode styles, and animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/offline/offlineQueue.ts: Implements a per‑principal FIFO queue for offline actions with persistence and basic queue operations.
frontend/src/offline/offlineStorage.ts: Utility for reading, writing, and clearing namespaced offline data in localStorage with versioning.
frontend/src/offline/OfflineSyncProvider: Watches online status and replays queued offline actions to the backend, then invalidates caches on successful sync.
frontend/src/offline/useOfflinePreferenc: Hook that stores and updates the user’s preference for enabling offline save behavior.
frontend/src/utils/analyticsFormat.ts: Provides helpers for formatting bigint counts, converting timestamps to readable dates, and displaying cache timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameter cleanup.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Defines Vite-specific TypeScript types, including an optional VITE_II_URL environment variable.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with plugins, custom colors, animations, and extended theme settings for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Describes project state and notes missing backend isCallerAdmin query required for admin dashboard visibility.
